Class ProcessorMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.hardware.tests.ProcessorMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, ProcessorServicesNotificationConsumerI, ProcessorStateDataConsumerI

    public class ProcessorMonitor
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements ProcessorStateDataConsumerI, ProcessorServicesNotificationConsumerI
    The class ProcessorMonitor implements a monitor component receiving data from processor components.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : April 24, 2015
